Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, good basic room, good value for Venice”

Reviews.Content: qiuet location busy thoroughfare near grand canal handy bus train stations surprisingly peaceful tucked feel reached charming ancient archway 101 basic double en suite clean retro fit aircon ceiling fan didnt towels changed daily breakfast simple continental bread service perfunctory desk service friendly particularly engaging overall value money absolutely ideal simple base
